pages.text: First, you need a medium that connects with nature.$(br2)You will need to find $(l:items/5_struck_log)Struck Trees$(/l) and gather Struck Log to summon $(9)lightning$().$(br2)Strike lapis lazuli with lightning to obtain nature crystals.$(br2)Once you have the nature crystal, you can craft a $(l:items/2_wand)wand$(/l) and use $(l:items/1_crystal)crystals$(/l) for $(l:mechanics/1_nature_spell#block_spell_casting)block spell casting$(/l).
